channel.title: Insecuritea: The Insecure Aftershow
channel.description: Ready for the run down? Fran (HeyFranHey, TheFriendZone) and Crissle (The Read) are primed to take you through the latest episode of HBO's Insecure with a dynamic dissection, known as Insecuritea. Tune in as they sip, share and spill on all things Insecure.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ready for the run down? Fran (HeyFranHey, TheFrie…
channel.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network

item.title: S5, Ep10: Everything Gonna Be, Okay?!
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
Cue the airhorns, it’s time for Crissle and Fran to reflect on the series finale and serve up one last cup of insecuritea.
Executive Producers: Chris Morrow, Matt Raz Producer: Matt Raz Editor and Associate Producer: Tyrell Worley Associate Producer: Jonathan Mena Engineer: Dwayne Crawford

item.title: S5 Ep8: “CHOICES, OKAY?!"
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
Crissle and Fran get into business prospects, the circle of life and make small talk about squirrels. Listen to hear why Fran calls this episode of Insecure her favorite of the season (at least so far).

item.title: S5, Ep2: Growth, Okay?!
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
Crissle and Fran are back to carpe that diem as we’re reintroduced to some old faces and meet some new ones. Join us for a spirited discussion of corporate politics, entrepenoires and battery-powered best friends.
Don't forget to join in the conversation on social media and let us know your thoughts and predictions using the hashtag #insecuriTEA
Executive Producers: Chris Morrow, Matt Raz Producer: Matt Raz Editor and Associate Producer: Ty Worley Engineer: Dwayne Crawford

item.title: Looking for LaToya - Missing or Murrrrrrdered? (Trailer)
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
When 26-year-old LaToya Thompson went missing, Rose Cranberry hopped right on the case.
Looking for LaToya stars Terri J. Vaughn as Rose Cranberry, SZA as LaToya Thompson, Porsha Williams as Tasha, Ray J as Rufus, Kandi Burruss-Tucker as Glenda, and Carl Anthony Payne II as Bryan.
It is a production of Raedio, Tenderfoot TV and HBO.
The Black and Missing Foundation, a nonprofit organization, supports and provides access to resources for thousands of families searching for missing loved ones. Visit BAMFI.ORG to join the movement to #HelpUsFindUs.
For more information, visit LookingForLaToya.com. Stream Insecure on HBO and HBO Max.
item.itunes:subtitle: When 26-year-old LaToya Thompson went missing, Ro…
item.description:
When 26-year-old LaToya Thompson went missing, Rose Cranberry hopped right on the case.
Looking for LaToya stars Terri J. Vaughn as Rose Cranberry, SZA as LaToya Thompson, Porsha Williams as Tasha, Ray J as Rufus, Kandi Burruss-Tucker as Glenda, and Carl Anthony Payne II as Bryan.
It is a production of Raedio, Tenderfoot TV and HBO.
The Black and Missing Foundation, a nonprofit organization, supports and provides access to resources for thousands of families searching for missing loved ones. Visit BAMFI.ORG to join the movement to #HelpUsFindUs.
For more information, visit LookingForLaToya.com. Stream Insecure on HBO and HBO Max.

item.title: S4, Ep4: Lowkey Losin' It
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: S4, Ep1: Lowkey Feelin' Myself
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
Four seasons in and everyone in Issa Dee’s world is growing… for the most part. Crissle and Fran are back to unpack the season premiere, the new show-within-a-show, and read the tea leaves to predict how the relationships between different characters will play out.
Don’t forget to join in on the conversation and follow along on social media with the hashtag #insecuriTEA.

item.title: S1, E8: Broken As F**k
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary: All good things must come to a bittersweet end. While Crissle predicted the unhappy ending for Issa, Fran was hoping for the best. Tune in as they break down the good, bad and the ugly in the latest deep dive of HBO's Insecure.
item.itunes:subtitle: All good things must come to a bittersweet end. W…
item.description: All good things must come to a bittersweet end. While Crissle predicted the unhappy ending for Issa, Fran was hoping for the best. Tune in as they break down the good, bad and the ugly in the latest deep dive of HBO's Insecure.

item.title: S1, E7: Real As F**k
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary: Things just got real. Molly may have finally dug herself into a hole she can’t get out of and Issa got plummeted off her high horse. Our besties can’t even lean on each other because they just had the most intense exchange of low blows. Episode 7 had a lot of OMG moments,--Crissle and Fran tackle it all in the latest recap of HBO’s Insecure.

Our besties can’t even lean on each other because they just had the most intense exchange of low blows. Episode 7 had a lot of OMG moments,--Crissle and Fran tackle it all in the latest recap of HBO’s Insecure.

item.title: S1, E6: Guilty As F**k
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary: Issa and Molly are dealing with the repercussions of their careless decisions. We still feel for them, though. Will they bounce back? Crissle and Fran weigh in on this week’s play by play of HBO’s Insecure.

item.title: S1, E5: Shady As F**k
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary: Relationships and unrealistic bae expectations are the hot topics this week as things heat up in Issa and Molly's love lives. We're nervous for the both of them. Crissle and Fran share a bit about their lessons in love too in the latest recap of HBO's Insecure.
item.itunes:subtitle: Relationships and unrealistic bae expectations ar…

item.title: S1, E4: Thirsty As F**k
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary: Our besties aren't seeing eye to eye and "Broken P*ssy" has resurfaced. Damn, Miss Issa! They got you again. Crissle and Fran laugh and cringe through it all in this week's run down of HBO's Insecure.

item.title: S1, E3: Racist As F**K
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary: Things are getting *tricky* in the workplace for everyone. And love? Even trickier. Crissle and Fran assess who's right and who's wrong as things heat up on HBO's Insecure.

item.title: S1, E2: Messy As F**k
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary: Love is messy. And so is dating. Crissle and Fran share some personal dating experiences that are funnily enough very similar to Molly’s. Listen in to see who’s about that #applife and who’s not, in this week’s deep dive of HBO’s Insecure.

item.title: S1, E1: Insecure As F**K
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary: For the inaugural episode of Insecuritea, Crissle and Fran take us through the lives of our new BFFs in our minds, Issa and Molly, from HBO’s Insecure. They talk love, friendship, old flings, and new tings. This is just the beginning.
